answer.explanation: Hi, it's Susan. Q1 Are you available to meet tomorrow morning? Q2 We should get a start on hiring a manager for our new restaurant. You know, the grand opening is in two months. Q3 We have a lot of resumes to read through, so I’ll e-mail you the most promising ones now. And then, when we meet, well discuss which candidates you want to interview. Let me know if this works for you. Thanks.

question.text: What is the purpose of the message?
What does the speaker imply when she says, “the grand opening is in two months .
choices: (B) She wants the listener to reserve a room.
(C)  A project will be completed on time.
(D) A decision must be made quickly.

answer.text: (D) A decision must be made quickly.

answer.explanation: Good morning, everybody. Q1 I hope your time here as interns at our art gallery has been a good experience for you so far. Today I want you to help us publicize the upcoming photography exhibition. It's the latest collection of works by the artist Jettrin Sakda. Q2 So I’d like each of you to take two hundred fliers with you today and distribute them around the area. In addition to handing them out to pedestrians, you’ll be visiting hotels and other businesses that have agreed to display our fliers for us. Don’t worry, Q3 I’ll give you a map where I ve circled the places I want you to go. Please be back at the gallery at five P.M. See you later!

answer.explanation: Q1&2 As president of this agency, I'm proud to officially announce that we’ve been nominated for this year's Advertising Excellence Award . This is a tribute to the hard work of everybody in this room. But I specifically want to point out the work that Luisa Perez and her team did on the Morton’s Baked Goods campaign. Q3 This campaign was so original that the bakery's revenue increased by twenty percent. I’d like to ask Ms. Perez to talk about what inspired her and her team for this stellar ad campaign.

question.text: What kind of business does the speaker work for?
What is the speaker announcing?

choices: (A) It helped a client increase profits.
(B) It made use of new technology.
(D) It led to changes to a company policy.

answer.text: (A) It helped a client increase profits.

answer.explanation: Hello and welcome to the Healthy Ways Exhibition here in San Antonio. My name is Hiroki, and I work at Cambria Technologies. Today, Q1 I’d like to show you a new persona! fitness-tracking device my company just released. What makes our device unique is not its many features — it actually has all the same features as the other fitness trackers. Q2 What sets ours apart is its price: it’s the least expensive device available. And by participating in today's session, Q3 you’ll get one to keep, at no cost to you! All you’ll have to do is fill out a survey about your exercise habits.

answer.explanation: Thanks for coming today, everyone. Q1 We’ll be going over some of the customer survey results for our new food mixer, the Gellick 500 . As you all know, this mixer includes a lot of great new features, and our customers really love them. According to the survey, Q2 the most popular feature of the mixer is that some parts can be detached, making it easier to clean than our last model. But because of all the added features, the user’s manual is currently about twenty pages long, Q3 so the editors will be working on that this week.

answer.explanation: Hi Mei-ling, this is Lee Sanders calling from Rose Avenue Properties. Q1 lt was great meeting you on Monday, and I hope you’re still considering renting the two-bedroom apartment I showed you. Q2 You also asked about parking in the garage next door, and I wanted to get back to you to let you know that there are a few spaces available. Anyway, this is a very popular building, so let me know what you want to do. That way, I can prepare all the necessary paperwork for the lease.

answer.explanation: Welcome to this meeting of Mill City Parks Alliance. Q1 As you know, we’ve been working to create a park in the town center, Q2 but unfortunately, we’re still short on funds. We’ve received donations from some community groups to assist in buying trees to plant in the park, but we still need additional funds for purchasing playground equipment and benches. I think we should contact some local businesses to see if they'd be willing to make a donation. Q3 So what I’d like us to do now is come up with a list of shop and restaurant owners who might be interested in helping with this project.

answer.explanation: OK everyone, I have one final reminder before we end this meeting. Q1 Since all of the cashiers are present, Q2 I want to remind you of an important step in customer transactions here at GL Supermarket. As you know, many of our customers are part of our membership program, which means that they receive five percent off their purchase when you swipe their membership card. Please remember that it is our responsibility to ask customers for their membership card when scanning their groceries. Q3 If a customer doesn’t have a membership card, make sure to mention that applications are available at the customer service desk.

answer.explanation: Hello, everyone. Q1 Thanks for coming to the Williams Staffing Agency today. We specialize in the placement of employees in temporary and long-term positions in a variety of companies from accounting to manufacturing. Today you’ll meet individually with our personal recruiters. They’re industry specialists who can give you some guidance as they match your skills to the needs of the companies you’d be best suited for. Q2 As you can see, all the seats here in this waiting room are filled today, so this might take some time.". Q2&3 While you wait, could you help us move things along by making a copy of your photo ID card? The copy machine is right over here.

Hello, passengers. Q1 This is an announcement from your conductor. Due to a freight train stalled at the next station, our departure will be delayed. The train ahead of US seems to be suffering a slight malfunction. Q2 Once we receive official permission from the traffic control center, we will proceed as normal. Unfortunately, we will arrive a little bit later than the scheduled arrival time. We apologize for this inconvenience. Q3 Please adjust your plans accordingly. Thank you for your patience. We should be on the move shortly.
